successes.title: Marbel Electric Skateboard
successes.description: Ride The Future with the Marbel Electric Skateboard

Pledges.description: THANK YOU - Get listed as a supporter on the Marbel website. Please share our project and help us spread the word!
DECALS - Durable, UV safe vinyl Marbel logo decals. Stick it on your board, laptop, helmet, or wherever!
T-SHIRT - Get your Kickstarter exclusive Marbel T-Shirt. This one is just for backers. Stay stylish and comfortable with this great looking shirt.
HOODIE - Get your Kickstarter exclusive Marbel Hoodie. This one is just for backers.  Stay stylish and comfortable in the cool weather!
MARBEL BOARD “SUPER EARLY BIRD” - Our first 25 supporters can get their Board at the very lowest price!  Includes the Marbel Board, Handheld Controller, and everything you need to get started!
MARBEL BOARD "EARLY BIRD" - You will receive a board from our first full production run.  Includes the Marbel Board, Handheld Controller, and everything you need to get started!
MARBEL BOARD - You will receive a board from our second batch of shipments.  Includes the Marbel Board, Handheld Controller, and everything you need to get started!
MARBEL BOARD - You will receive a board from our third batch of shipments.  Includes the Marbel Board, Handheld Controller, and everything you need to get started!

FULL CUSTOM MARBEL BOARD - You will receive a board from our second batch of shipments.  Includes the Marbel Board, Handheld Controller, and everything you need to get started! - You pick the paint color of the deck, color of the wheels, what bearings you want, and even custom grip tape!

Receive a production board signed by the whole Marbel team. Plus visit the Marbel team in Tampa at our facility and we'll even take you out to dinner,  You will be responsible for your own transportation to the Tampa area.
